text.section: There is an Education Trust Fund which is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.

section.section: There shall be credited to the Education Trust Fund all proceeds allocated to the Fund under § 9-1A-27 of this subtitle.
Money in the Education Trust Fund shall be invested and reinvested by the Treasurer, and interest and earnings shall accrue to the Fund.

text.section: Expenditures from the Education Trust Fund shall be made each fiscal year in accordance with the State budget.
